text:
<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Informational message: Increased Billing Console Error Rates>
We are investigating errors affecting the Billing Console including the Dashboard and the Bills page.

<http://status.aws.amazon.com/|Service is operating normally: [RESOLVED] Increased Billing Console Error Rates>
Between 12:28 PM and 2:10 PM PST we experienced increased error rates affecting the Billing Console including the Dashboard and the Bills page. The issue has been resolved and the service is operating normally.
